Program spotlights

Experiences Guard-connected youth ask for again and again

Adventure kits, camps, and leadership tracks keep Guard-connected youth plugged in all year long. These highlights give partners and caregivers a quick look at what sets Iowa CYP apart.

Program Series

Adventure Kits

Ideal for: Ages 6-14 military-connected youth

Adventure Kits deliver seasonal STEM projects, health tips, and hands-on challenges Guard families open anytime with videos and supplies ready.

Sign Up

Camp

Summer Camp

Ideal for: Middle and high school military youth

Weeklong Summer Camp challenges Guard teens with team adventures, leadership labs, and mentor support that build lifelong friendships and confidence.

Get Updates

Campaign

Month of the Military Child

Ideal for: Military kids, families, educators

Every April, the military community unites to support and celebrate military children and their families during Month of the Military Child. Nationwide, people wear purple to honor the sacrifices military youth make throughout their parents' careers. In Iowa, we provide classrooms with celebration kits, including Purple Up wristbands, so military children can share in the celebration with their classmates.

Request a Kit

Program

Military Family Events

Ideal for: Military families statewide

Military Family Events gather Guard households for regional celebrations, workshops, and volunteer-led activities that strengthen community across Iowa all year.

View Events

Workshop

Yellow Ribbon

Ideal for: Youth experiencing deployment

Youth attending these events are given the tools to navigate through the deployment process. At these events youth are given the opportunity to connect with others going through similar life challenges. If you are experiencing a deployment and want to find out more about this program, contact your local Yellow Ribbon team.

Contact Yellow Ribbon

Mentorship

State Teen Panel

Ideal for: Military-connected teens ages 13-17

A leadership and service program that brings together military-connected teens from across Iowa to represent the voices of their peers, develop leadership skills, and support youth initiatives throughout the state.

Join Today

About Iowa CYP

Fostering community, resilience, and positive development among Iowa's military-connected children and families.
